events.name: Singapore SharePoint Community Meeting - July 2015
events.description: In the July User Group meeting we will have two sessions. Milan Gross Synergy Highlights from Ignite 2015 In this session we will cover some of the highlight announcements and insights from the Microsoft Ignite 2015 event in Chicago. Eric Kyaw Synergy Automating the creation of SharePoint Sites In this session, Eric will demonstrate a solution he developed which fully automates the creation of SharePoint sites, lists, libraries, folders, content types, and columns using the Client Side Object Model.
events.location: Microsoft Singapore, One Marina Boulevard, Level 22, Meeting Room

events.name: Book Club: High Performance Browser Networking
events.description: We're going to be working through this highly-regarded book by Google engineer, Ilya Grigorik: High Performance Browser Networking: What Every Web Developer Should Know about Networking and Web Performance This week we'll be covering Chapter 10 & 11: Primer on Web Performance & HTTP/1.X Please read the chapter before you come to the meetup! Book club is held at Tim & Wei's residence: 244A Tanjong Katong Rd Singapore 437032 Singapore Doors open at 6:30, meetup starts at 7. Feel free to ask questions in the SingaporeJS gitter room: https://gitter.im/SingaporeJS/discussions
events.location: Tim & Wei's Residence, 244A Tanjong Katong Road, Singapore
